entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
